  • Welcome to LITESOPH’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to LITESOPH’s documentation!

LITESOPH is the abriviated form of Layer Integrated Toolkit and Engine for Simullations Of Photo-Induced Phenomena. It is a GUI-based software to ferform the ground state DFT and TDDFT calculations using three engines : GPAW, NWChem and Octopus .

Contents

  • LITESOPH
    • Engines Interfaced with LITESOPH

        • Evaluating the Coupling Matrix element from a real-time propagation
